## Takeaways

-   Ecosystem services ("ES") are the benefits that people derive from nature

-   There are 4 groups of ES: cultural, provisioning, regulating, and supporting

**Next Lesson**

-   Why are they called "services" and what are the pros/cons (2 min intro [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@iguanalow/video/7159068103131794731?_t=8YHwUUN0u86&_r=1))

-   How are ES distributed across space and time? Who has access and who does not
